subject: Baseball
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: Andrew Brackman, a first-round draft choice by the Yankees in 2007, had Tommy John surgery that year. He missed the 2008 season and struggled in the minor leagues in 2009.
snippet: Andrew Brackman, a first-round draft choice by the Yankees in 2007, had Tommy John surgery that year. He missed the 2008 season and struggled in the minor leagues in 2009.
